alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; Quitman (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 2:16PM CST until December 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... Coahoma County in northwestern Mississippi... West central Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 300 PM CST. * At 215 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crumrod, or near White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Elaine, Helena-West Helena, White River National Wildlife Refuge, Marks, Jonestown, Friars Point, Belen, Kings, Sherard, Crumrod, Lake View, Coahoma, Lyon, Lula, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Wabash, and Rudyard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.
